questions.question: What is the first step in the problem-solving process?
choices: Understanding the problem
Choosing a programming language
Writing code
Debugging

questions.question: What is the main benefit of breaking down a complex problem into smaller parts?
choices: It makes the problem easier to understand and solve
It makes the code run faster
It reduces the number of lines of code needed
It eliminates the need for error handling
questions.answer: It makes the problem easier to understand and solve

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of using functions in problem-solving?
choices: To organize code into reusable and modular parts
To make the code more difficult to read
To increase the overall code length
To slow down the program execution
questions.answer: To organize code into reusable and modular parts

questions.question: Which Python data structure is most suitable for storing key-value pairs?
choices: Dictionary
List
Set
Tuple

questions.question: What is algorithmic thinking?
choices: The process of developing step-by-step solutions to problems
The art of writing complex and unreadable code
The practice of copying and pasting code from the internet
The technique of avoiding error handling in programs
questions.answer: The process of developing step-by-step solutions to problems

questions.question: Which Python keyword is used to start a loop that iterates over a sequence?
choices: for
while
iterate
loop

questions.question: What is the purpose of a try-except block in Python?
choices: To handle exceptions and prevent the program from crashing
To improve the performance of the program
To make the code more difficult to understand
To create infinite loops intentionally
questions.answer: To handle exceptions and prevent the program from crashing

questions.question: What is the main advantage of using a debugger tool?
choices: It allows you to step through the code and inspect variables
It automatically fixes all the bugs in your code
It makes your code run faster
It eliminates the need for error handling
questions.answer: It allows you to step through the code and inspect variables

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a problem-solving technique?
choices: Decomposition
Procrastination
Obfuscation
Randomization

questions.question: What is the purpose of list comprehensions in Python?
choices: To create new lists based on existing lists in a concise way
To make the code more difficult to read
To slow down the program execution
To handle exceptions and errors
questions.answer: To create new lists based on existing lists in a concise way

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a requirement for the final project?
choices: Using a graphical user interface (GUI)
Choosing a complex problem relevant to Timor-Leste
Applying problem-solving techniques learned in class
Writing a report explaining the problem-solving approach

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'raise' keyword in Python?
choices: To explicitly raise an exception
To catch and handle exceptions
To define a new function
To import a module

questions.question: Which of the following is a common debugging technique?
choices: Using print statements to output variable values
Randomly changing parts of the code
Ignoring error messages and exceptions
Deleting the entire codebase and starting from scratch
questions.answer: Using print statements to output variable values

questions.question: What is the main benefit of using a set data structure in Python?
choices: It stores unique elements and provides fast membership testing
It maintains the order of elements as they were inserted
It allows duplicate elements
It is a mutable data structure
questions.answer: It stores unique elements and provides fast membership testing

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a real-world dataset that could be used for problem-solving in the context of Timor-Leste?
choices: Agricultural production data
Movie ratings from Hollywood
Social media trends in the United States
Stock market data from Wall Street
